Use Effective Sample Size to Check Mixing

ess_checks.Rd

For a BEAST2 run or a TransPhylo run, pull the effective sample size for estimated parameters. Check that they are above some threshold.

Usage

ess_checks(
  program = c("BEAST2", "TransPhylo"),
  path_to_mcmc_log,
  burn_in_fraction = 0.1,
  sample_interval = 5000,
  min_ess
)

Arguments

program

Character string. Either "BEAST2" or "TransPhylo".

path_to_mcmc_log

Character string. Path to the MCMC log file.

burn_in_fraction

Numeric. Fraction of the MCMC chain to discard as burn-in.

sample_interval

Numeric. Interval at which samples were taken.

min_ess

Numeric. Minimum effective sample size to consider acceptable.
